headline: Eaton (ETN): Valuation Spotlight After Landmark U.S. Army MV-75 Defense Contract Win
summary: Eaton (ETN) just landed a major contract with Bell Textron Inc. to design, develop, and certify the aerial refueling retractable probe for the U.S. Army’s next-generation MV-75 assault aircraft. This isn’t just about new business; it highlights Eaton’s growing capabilities in advanced defense technology and reinforces its reputation for innovation in specialized power management. For investors watching Eaton’s track record on strategic military awards, the contract’s scope and exposure are...
